qas.question: Who has the majority of the seats in Bern's City Council?
What party also had the mayor as of 2015?
What is the Christian Democratic Party also known as?

context: As of 2015, Bern's City Council is made up of two representatives of the SP (<a1_0>Social Democratic Party<a1_0/>, of whom one is also the mayor), and one each of <a2_0>CVP<a2_0/> (Christian Democratic Party), GB (Green Alliance of Berne), and FDP (FDP.The Liberals), giving the <a0_0>left parties<a0_0/> a majority of three out of five seats. The last election was held on 25 November 2012.
